item.description: Select 'Yes' to enable the addition of Weather.
Select the preferred weather service to supply the weather information.
Enter the location for your weather forecasts.
Enter a personalized API key for use with OpenWeatherMap (https://openweathermap.org/).
Select the temperature unit to be used for temperature displays.
Choose the icon set. You need to create an additional set here: /usr/share/enigma2/WeatherIconSets/NAME.
Choose whether the 'night switch' should be activated or not. Some icons are then displayed as night icons with moon.
Specify how often Weather retrieves its data from the server. 'Once' means the data will loaded only once after a GUI or system start.
Select this option to save that last obtained weather data locally. This is used to initialize the data immediately after restart while updated data is being fetched.
Select 'Yes' to enable add debug output to log.
